faqs.q: How many calories per gram in carbs?
faqs.a: Digestible carbohydrates contain 4 kcal per gram.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories between carbs and fiber?
faqs.a: Fiber has about 2 kcal per gram, while digestible carbs have 4 kcal per gram.

faqs.q: Do all carbs have the same calories per gram?
faqs.a: Yes, most digestible carbs (sugars and starches) provide 4 kcal per gram; fiber is lower.

faqs.q: How does this compare to protein or fat?
faqs.a: Carbs: 4 kcal/g; protein: 4 kcal/g; fat: 9 kcal/g.

faqs.q: Why use calories per gram for carbs in diet tracking?
faqs.a: It helps calculate energy from carb-heavy foods like bread, pasta, or fruits accurately.
